title: How can we think about ideas? - Quora

response.answer_text: Mantra: How can we make it better? There has to be better way! Every day Morning as soon as you wake up and night before going to bed repeat this mantra for 3 times, magic is going to happen in a few days. You start thinking to improve every things you use or see around you. Example:  This is what we teeach at http://youngtycoons.co.in
